unnormalised: Hey, any news on Virat? Heard he twisted his ankle during the Ranji Trophy match in Bangalore. Dr. Sharma said it's not a major tear, just a sprain. Hope he recovers soon! Rs. 500 says he'll be back smashing sixes at Eden Gardens in no time. They've even upgraded the facilities to a 2000 sq ft recovery room. Jaldi theek ho jao, champ!
